page.title: 02A school day morning.
page.content: When I wake up which is about 7 o'clock,I just lie there for about ten minutes.Then I go downstairs and have a cup of tea and a bowl of cornflakes with my brother. Then we both go upstairs and get dressed.By now my dad is usually up and my mum is always up before me. After we've dressed,I go downstairs and pack my bag for school-it's full of homework,if we were unlucky the night before!My dad is usually downstairs having his breakfast when my brother and I leave for school at about half past eight. Then it's school.Oh well,never mind!
